are_you_sure_exit: Are you sure you want to exit before {{direction}} your pipette?
attach_the_pipette:
Attach the pipette

Push in the white connector tab until you feel it plug into the pipette.
attached_pipette_does_not_match: The attached {{name}} does not match the {{pipette}} you had originally selected.
check_pipette_is_unplugged: Check again to ensure that pipette is unplugged and entirely detached from the robot.
insert_screws:
Insert screws

Using a 2.5 mm screwdriver, insert the the three screws on the back of the pipette.
level_the_pipette:
Level the pipette

Using your hand, gently and slowly push the pipette up.Place the calibration block in slot {{slot}} with the {{side}} surface on the {{direction}} side.Pull the pipette down so all 8 nozzles touch the surface of the block.While holding the pipette down, tighten the three screws.Gently and slowly push the pipette back up.
loosen_the_screws:
Loosen the screws

Using a 2.5 mm screwdriver, loosen the three screws on the back of the pipette that is currently attached.
press_white_connector: Make sure to press the white connector tab in as far as you can, and that you feel it connect with the pipette.
remove_labware_before_start:
Before you begin

Before starting, remove all labware from the deck and all tips from pipettes. The gantry will move to the front of the robot.
remove_pipette:
Remove the pipette

Hold onto the pipette so it does not fall. Disconnect the pipette from the robot by pulling the white connector tab.
tighten_screws_multi: Starting with screw #1, loosely tighten the screws with a clockwise motion. You will tighten them fully in a later step.
tighten_screws_single: Starting with screw #1, tighten the screws with a clockwise motion.
